name: Of Night & Day
description: This game works on the premise of swapping between two characters based on the environment. While you are in a dark environment or considered "lost" you play as a  short wizard we have named Lost. While you are in a bright area or considered "found", you play as a lighthearted swordswoman named Found. Lost jumps higher using magic and has a ranged attack that can hit through walls, but he's quite slow. Found however is incredibly acrobatic, has the ability to dash through the air, and attacks with a sword.
